cause.description:
1. Attending Eng. medium schools is a right&choice all parents have& ensuring that children understand the lang.but OURS
2. Ensuring that each child understands the language they are being taught in
3. Senior citizens should be appreciated & treasured!
4. FREE Tutoring in Eng. by Volunteer Senior Citizens makes 4 an excellent MENTORSHIP Prog.
5. No Edu.=No Job, Preg./Unmarried=No Job but No More wz Dream2Reads FREE Skills Dev. & Guaranteed EMPLOYMENT wz our Job creation Pro.
cause.mission: Free tutoring 2 children attending English-medium schools but for whom English is not a home language
cause.name: DREAM 2 READ
